pr_title: Copy map attributes always to avoid unexpected changes

timeline.bodyText: Since this method is also used elsewhere, I'd rather see it moved to a separate utility class, rather than leave it in here.
timeline.author: jkwatson

replies.bodyText: Can I do it in a separate PR?
replies.author: bogdandrutu
